questions.question: What are your business hours?
questions.answer: Our business hours are 9AM-5PM Monday to Friday, We are closed on weekends and holidays. However, you can always reach us through our website for general inquiries.

questions.question: Do you offer international shipping?
questions.answer: We currently do not offer international shipping. However, we are always exploring new options and may expand in the future.

questions.question: What payment methods do you accept?

questions.question: What is your return policy?

questions.question: How can I contact customer service?
questions.answer: You can reach customer service by email at support@customerservice.com, or through our live chat on the website.

questions.question: Can I speak to a live representative?
questions.answer: Unfortunately, we cannot connect you to a live representative at this moment. However, I can answer your questions or direct you to the appropriate resources on our website.

questions.question: What is the difference between your shipping options?
questions.answer: We offer a variety of shipping options to meet your needs. You can find a detailed comparison of our shipping options, including estimated delivery times and costs, on our website at [insert shipping options page].

questions.question: How long will it take for my order to arrive?
questions.answer: Delivery times vary depending on your location and the chosen shipping option. You can estimate your delivery timeframe at checkout or by entering your tracking number on the BRT website https://rastreamento.correios.com.br/.

questions.question: My order status says 'processing.' What does that mean?
questions.answer: A processing order means your order is being prepared for shipment. This may include verifying your information, picking and packaging your items. Once complete, your order will be shipped and you will receive a tracking number.

questions.question: I haven't received a tracking number yet. When will I get it?
questions.answer: Tracking numbers are typically emailed within [timeframe] of your order being shipped. You can also check your order status on our website to see if a tracking number has been assigned.

questions.question: My tracking number isn't working. What should I do?
questions.answer: There may be a slight delay between shipment and when the tracking information becomes available online. Please wait a few hours and try again. If the issue persists, please contact us and we can investigate further.

questions.question: Can I change my delivery address after I place an order?
questions.answer: Unfortunately, we cannot change the delivery address once an order is processed. However, you may contact our delivery partner directly to see if they can reroute your package for an additional fee https://www.correios.com.br/falecomoscorreios.

questions.question: My order arrived damaged. What should I do?
questions.answer: We apologize for the inconvenience. Please contact us at [phone number] or [email address] and we will be happy to assist you with a replacement or refund.

questions.question: How do I create an account?
questions.answer: Creating an account is easy! Simply visit our website and click on 'Sign Up' or 'Create Account.' You will be prompted to enter your information and create a password.

questions.question: I forgot my password. How can I reset it?
questions.answer: No problem! Click on 'Forgot Password' on the login page and enter your email address. We will send you instructions on how to reset your password.
